<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>pm_project_task</collection> <condition>current.run_calc_brs != false</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Process State Change</name> <order>150</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[/* * Service-now.com * Process related tasks when a project record state is modified. * Start child tasks, start successors, and close parent * * REQUIRES: depends on rule 'Task Active State Management' running prior to properly set active status from state changes */
if (typeof origSysId == 'undefined' || origSysId == null) { var origSysId = current.sys_id; }
try { if (!current.isActionAborted()) { if (current.operation() == "insert" || (current.operation() == "update" && current.state.changes()) || (current.operation() == "update" && current.parent.changes() && !current.parent.nil())) PlannedTaskStateChangeHandler.processStateChange(current, previous, origSysId); if (current.operation() == "delete" && (!current.parent.nil())) PlannedTaskUtilsV2.handleParentStateOnChildDelete(current); } } catch (err) { gs.error('Exception is thrown in Project Task Process State Change BR' + err); } finally { if (origSysId == current.sys_id) origSysId = null; }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2013-05-20 22:41:50</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>03de4950ef21010032a05ad595c0fb48</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>96</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Process State Change</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_03de4950ef21010032a05ad595c0fb48</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-01 17:43:21</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=03de4950ef21010032a05ad595c0fb48"/> </record_update>
